verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
We wrestle not with flesh and with blood
But powers and principalities
We wrestle not with each others love
But demonic forces in the heavenlies

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse:
I have decided Im gonna make a stand
I have decided Im takin back my land
I have decided thus far and no more
Im gonna take up the sword and fight in the name of the Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Je sus Lord of Lords
Je sus Almighty King
Je sus The Li on of Ju dah
